verbs.description: [V: is] waiting for lauri markkanen to return a spectator sport bulls coach fred hoiberg will have his hands full trying to keep the team competitive without his best player who out three to five weeks zach lavine kris dunn wendell carter jr chicago bobby portis lauri markkanen queensland cricket team carmelo anthony fred hoiberg markkanen jabari parker bulls james harden
